column4: How many CD's does the 7.10 release use?  Is there a way to download all the ISO's for a complete 7.10 release so that a network is not needed?
there's a dvd release has most stuff http://torrent.ubuntu.com/releases/gutsy/release/dvd/
but be aware, a lot of packages have been updated, you'll still need a net to be up to date
